subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Franks stuff/The new linear sweep box/Frank-YourGhostBoxesActuallyGetTheGhost-Talkin'.mp3 
  Uploaded by : purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...> 
  Description : A voice from the first session.  This method seems to allow longer messages, which seems to still be pretty much ignored.  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Franks%20stuff/The%20new%20linear%20sweep%20box/Frank-YourGhostBoxesActuallyGetTheGhost-Talkin%27.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...>
